Text: Re cross charges Cc Hi Rod Marla asked me to get in touch with you regarding Gaye Mayeaux I spoke to Margaret Dennison and she confirmed that we can charge Gayes time directly through HR to whatever company and cost center you want Would you please have someone contact us with the company number and cost center number I understand the effective date is July Please let me know if you have any questions My extention is Thanks Carolyn Barrett Forwarded by Carolyn BarrettEnron Communications on PM Margaret Dennison PM To Carolyn BarrettEnron nron Communications cc Subject Re cross charges Yes definately Please give the company number the cost center and the percentage of her time being worked there thanks md Carolyn Barrett PM To Margaret DennisonEnron nron Communications cc Subject cross charges Can you set Gaye up on the HR system that her time gets charged to ETS without any billing Thanks Carolyn Forwarded by Carolyn BarrettEnron Communications on PM Marla Barnard AM To Carolyn BarrettEnron nron Communications cc Subject cross charges Carolyn Gaye Mayeaux will be taking a short term assignment with Rod Hayslett beginning July and it could last for mths I need to explain to Rod how the cross charging works can you provide me that info thanks Marla Barnard Vice President Human Resources Enron Broadband Services Office Fax Embedded StdOleLink
